item.description:
Howdy All,

Saturday, April 6th... Bobby Carlson and the Stones River band.

A native of Southern Massachusetts, Bobby and his family moved to Nashville in 1996 to pursue a career as a singer. He soon started singing demos for such writers as Mark Alan Springer, AJ Masters, and Phillip Moore. Bobby has experienced sharing the stage with Faith Hill, Leann Rimes, Charlie Daniels, Mark Chestnut, Marty Stuart, Darryl Worley, John Anderson, Tanya Tucker, Bryan White, and Leann Womack.

Next THEME night: April 20th I wish I was on VACATION !!
Dress like you favorite vacation destination or wear a t-shirt from you favorite vacation spot.
Put your thinking caps on and get creative !!
EVERY SATURDAY NIGHT:
Doors open at 7:00
Line dance lessons 7:30 - 8:30
Band 9:00 - 12:30
Ask about our private VIP party area !
See you at Midnight......................Rodeo Bar
www.midnightrodeobar.com
603-703-8444
item.name: Live Country Music and Dancing
